content.howToPlay: Select your desired map to begin driving. If you want to cruise over the hills with your monster truck by the sea, the first map is for you. The other two maps provide city streets and empty areas with buildings. You are free to do whatever you want! Use your access to seven awesome cars with diverse purposes: city bus, sedan, sports car, truck, tank, military 8x8, and monster truck. No restrictions, just pure driving enjoyment!

fullContent: Home› DrivingVehicles SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenVehicles Simulator is a simulator game where you can get in the driver’s seat of seven excellent vehicles ranging from a sedan to a monster truck. Drive your preferred car on the city streets or a sandy beach near the sea. Or in an area full of buildings. Enjoy driving your vehicle in one of the most enjoyable driving games on Online Games!How to Play Vehicles SimulatorSelect your desired map to begin driving. If you want to cruise over the hills with your monster truck by the sea, the first map is for you. The other two maps provide city streets and empty areas with buildings. You are free to do whatever you want! Use your access to seven awesome cars with diverse purposes: city bus, sedan, sports car, truck, tank, military 8x8, and monster truck. No restrictions, just pure driving enjoyment!Settings of the VehiclesThe best part of this car game is that you can customize your vehicle’s settings as you wish. All you need to do is to choose your favorite vehicle among seven options. Then click on the “Settings” section on the right side of the screen. Many adjustment options exist here, such as engine, transmission, and steering. There are even driving assists that you can activate. These adjustments will double the pleasure you will get while driving!EngineTransmissionSteeringDriving AssistsDrift AssistAxle 0Axle 1Drive Military VehiclesYou have the option to drive a tank and a military 8x8 vehicle. Unbelievable, isn’t it? The idea of ​​driving a tank through the city streets is crazy. With these two huge vehicles, you are free to wander around the map as you wish. You can even use a truck that carries a trailer. Get in the driver’s seat and go near the trailer. Press the T key to attach it to the truck. All is done!ControlsWASD/Arrow Keys: MoveC Key: Change Camera ViewV Key: Enter/Change VehicleSpacebar: HandbrakeT Key: Attach TrailerDeveloperVehicles Simulator was developed by FreezeNova.What is More?If you are a Vehicles Simulator fan, you may also enjoy playing GTA Simulator. You will have some important tasks in the game. Follow the instructions of Jackson. Find his place and fulfill the tasks he gives. Save the island from the greedy Mayor!For more options, take a look at the simulator games on OnlineGames.io by following the link. Bookmark this website to easily access new and thrilling games. Dozens of free online games are at your service with just one click.This article was updated on February 23, 20241 Player3DCarDriftDrivingFreeSimulatorSpeedTankTruck
